name: Andrea Pirlo - Italy’s Bearded Regista
description:
A regista – or a deep-lying playmaker is synonymous with the legendary – Andrea Pirlo. The graceful Italian possesses an extraordinary talent in splitting up any defense but the immediate honor lies in being able to pull off a beard, which is normally reserved for a select few in the world of football.

When asked about his beard he once said: “It wasn’t bothering me in the summer so I let it grow. Now I don’t waste time shaving…”

Here is a tribute to the modern personification of “cool,” in today’s game and most importantly that one aspect that has defined Pirlo in the past few years – his beard.

Andrea Pirlo – One of the most graceful of Italian footballers to possesses an extraordinary talent in splitting up any defense. The same goes for a man who has adorned a glorified beard.

Here is a tribute to the modern personification of “cool,” in today’s game and most importantly that one aspect that has defined Pirlo in the past few years – his beard in a pure 100% cotton form.

name: Xavi - Get the Ball, Pass the Ball
description:
Xavi - A player of such ability, elegance and craftiness that fellow professionals are always flattering in their praise of a footballer who is arguably the finest midfielder in today’s game.

A simple pass-and-move element to the game repeated each week with dynamism, resolve and precision is the trademark not only of the entire regiment of Barcelona, but of 33-yr-old magician.

Here is to capturing Xavi’s simple outlook towards the game on a Tee.

name: 3moory - The pride of UAE
description:
The Arab Afro-man footballer redefined. A left foot star in the making. A fairer version of a Fellaini look alike (only facially). The pride of UAE football and we assume to a certain extent, Middle Eastern football, after the Omani GK Ali Al-Habsi.

Celebrate the upcoming talent, nicknamed 3moory, featuring that one element which distinguishes him on the field - His hair.

name: Balotelli - Super/Silly
description:
Mario operates between two distinct points. The super and the super silly. He has us saying superlatives of his skill or us chuckling uncontrollably on his infantile behavior.

But whatever he does, there is always the anticipation of his next action, his next move, his next statement all combined to form a great set of histrionics. And this design celebrates 'why always him'.

Each tee is a hundred percent cotton. The design is screen printed. The collars have extra layer of stitching to ensure shape and durability. The thickness and quality of cotton was selected to ensure maximum comfort. The cut, what we call a 'good fit', ensures you wear your heart out and look good on the street, in a cafe, on casual day in the office, or in a club.

name: Lionel Messi - Appreciation
description:
The sight of Lionel Messi scoring has become common. So is this celebration of his. The fingers pointing to the sky is his appreciation and dedication to his maternal grandmother Celia, who took the little Messi to the 7.5 by 40m Grandoli ground in Rosario when he was just five-years-old.

Leo Messi's goals might be getting common, the beauty of it doesn't, his genius doesn't and there will be far too many times he will sprint to the corner with his hands up to the heavens.

Each tee is a hundred percent cotton. The design is screen printed. The collars have extra layer of stitching to ensure shape and durability. The thickness and quality of cotton was selected to ensure maximum comfort. The cut, what we call a 'good fit', ensures you wear your heart out and look good on the street, in a cafe, on casual day in the office, or in a club.

name: Cristiano Ronaldo - The Great Dipper Stance
description:
Greatness is always accompanied by a skill that is both signature and is almost difficult to imitate with a fair degree of precision. Cristiano Ronaldo has that skill when it comes to dead ball situations.

We celebrate that stance with this design, which leaves the opposition in jittery nerves, the support with great expectations, and then the coming seconds with the great dipper, a ball dipping and swerving with such intensity and uncertainty, it is a delight to watch.

Each tee is a hundred percent cotton. The design is screen printed. The collars have extra layer of stitching to ensure shape and durability. The thickness and quality of cotton was selected to ensure maximum comfort. The cut, what we call a 'good fit', ensures you wear your heart out and look good on the street, in a cafe, on casual day in the office, or in a club.

name: Introduction to UAE Pro League
description:
UAE football has taken itself up a notch in a few years’ time. From the first time appearance at the Olympics, to having one their brightest prospects train with Manchester City, to winning the Gulf Cup, and finally to qualifying for the beach World Cup in Tahiti later this year.

However, the role the domestic league in UAE has played in achieving all this recent greatness cannot be forgotten. To celebrate it's significance, we have teamed up with specialist info-graphic’er, Shahed Syed, to briefly introduce the UAE Pro league in visual format since its formation.

POSTER DETAILS

SIZE 20 x 30 inches.

Full Color Print on Semi Gloss Photo Paper (8MIL, 200GSM).

Posters will be rolled up and shipped in heavy duty mailing tubes.
